import React,{useState}from'react';import supabase from'../../services/supabaseClient';import'./Task.css';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function TaskItem(_ref){let{task,categories,refreshTasks,isHighlighted,isCompleted}=_ref;const[isEditing,setIsEditing]=useState(false);const[editedTask,setEditedTask]=useState({...task});const[error,setError]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const[isQuickEdit,setIsQuickEdit]=useState(false);const[actionFeedback,setActionFeedback]=useState('');// „Éï„Ç£„Éº„Éâ„Éê„ÉÉ„ÇØ„É°„ÉÉ„Çª„Éº„Ç∏„ÇíËá™ÂãïÊ∂àÂéª
